scripts.build: pnpm run build:rust && pnpm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: pnpm run clean:ts && shx rm -rf dist && chmod +x ../../scripts/cli.sh && ../../scripts/cli.sh bundle
scripts.build:rust: pnpm run clean:rust && shx rm -rf dist && chmod +x ../../scripts/cli.sh && ../../scripts/cli.sh bundle rust
scripts.build:dev: pnpm run build:dev:rust && pnpm run build:dev:ts
scripts.build:dev:rust: pnpm run clean:rust && shx rm -rf dist && chmod +x ../../scripts/cli.sh && ../../scripts/cli.sh bundle rust --target=dev
scripts.build:dev:ts: pnpm run clean:ts && shx rm -rf dist && chmod +x ../../scripts/cli.sh && ../../scripts/cli.sh bundle --target=dev
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:ts && shx rm -rf node_modules && pnpm run clean:rust && shx rm -rf rust/target && shx rm -rf .turbo
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access=public
